root.str: A duckbill choke causes pellets to spread in a wide, horizontal pattern.

A scenic cluster of tropical islands which have only recently been rediscovered. Oshur is defined by sandy beaches, dense jungles and cliff-top savannah. Unlike other continents, there are no Warpgates present among the islands, forcing each faction to bring a Flotilla of Exodus Fleet Carriers to bolster their war efforts.

Mythological Etymology

  • Major facilities on Oshur are named after icons of Philippine mythology: Anat, Anlabban, Bago, Binusilan, Dekat, Imbanon, Pilay, Sibo, and Sirinan

Geographical Features

  • Shallow Waters: [PROCESSING]
  • Coral Reefs: [PROCESSING]
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 720.
The Season of Love has begun!

The Javelin is an experimental recon vehicle with hover capabilities, allowing it to quickly traverse all types of terrain. Like the Flash, the Javelin can carry a single passenger in an exposed rumble seat. This passenger can use their equipment and abilities as normal.

Faction: NS Operatives
Size: Small
Type: Transport
Movement: Hover

The underbarrel Cure Launcher heals affected allies over time, and cleanses most status effects on impact. Equipping this attachment increases the equip time of the weapon by 0.25 seconds.

Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of feathers. NC use only.
Unlocks the Havoc Mine for NS Engineers.

The Prowler is a versatile tank used exclusively by the Terran Republic. It boasts a higher top speed than other tanks and comes equipped with twin barrel cannons that are capable of quickly inflicting damage. The Prowler finds use as an artillery vehicle, able to deploy to Anchored Mode to easily deal damage to faster moving vehicles or those at longer ranges.

Faction: Terran Republic
Size: Large
Type: MBT
Movement: Tank
Direct hits now strip 10% maximum shield health and ability energy from enemies, and will deal high damage to small deployables, but reduces your total damage by 20% at all ranges.
Share the love with your Seraphim HLX heavy crossbow or customize your favorite aircraft with heart-stopping new contrail and afterburner effects.

FL-34 claims this is a replica of a limited-edition Punisher stolen from a Nanite Systems showroom while it was in the process of being auctioned off. It has no unique functionality aside from looking pretty. All factions can use NS weapons.
Allows squadmates to spawn directly into the vehicle, and passively reports the movement of hostile enemies within 120 meters of the vehicle to nearby allies.

The Flash is a light four-wheeled all-terrain vehicle capable of quickly getting the driver and one passenger to the front lines. The passenger can use most of their personal equipment while riding on the back.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Small
Type: Transport
Movement: Wheeled

Battles in PlanetSide 2 take place over various warzones we refer to as "continents." To participate in the massive battles these continents create, you'll want to access a Warpgate terminal or open the map interface (default 'M' key) and select "World Map" from the dropdown at the top.

From here, you can select a continent currently in conflict (one without a lock icon) and then press the Warp button below to be transported to your faction's Warpgate on that continent.
Unlocks the Flashbang Mine for use by the VS Infiltrator.
Unlocks the Flashbang Mine for the VS Engineer.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 80 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 130 rounds.
KCAP ammunition removes the legshot damage penalty, and increases damage to the leg area by 20%, but decreases headshot damage by 50%.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 14 rounds, and the weapon takes 15% longer to equip and unequip.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 60 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.

"Freedom Over Oppression"

Rebels, freedom fighters, or terrorists? The New Conglomerate operates as a loosely organized band of dissidents, vehemently opposed to the stranglehold that the Terran Republic has on Auraxis. Led by an unusual band of outcasts, industry titans, pirates, and former military leaders, the New Conglomerate is unwavering in its vision and prepared to achieve their goals by any means necessary.

Infantry Weapon Signature:
  • Hard hitting weapons

Exclusive Vehicles:
  • Vanguard
  • Reaver
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Get this bundled set of Legion infantry helmets and armors. For TR use only.

A vast tundra interspersed by frozen rivers, ancient glaciers, and blinding snow, Esamir is an arctic wasteland rich in untapped resources and alien relics secreted away beneath the ice.

Mythological Etymology

  • Major facilities on Esamir are named after icons of Norse mythology: Andvari, Eisa, Elli, Freyr, Mani, Nott, and Ymir

Geographical Features

  • Black Ridge: [PROCESSING]
  • Crystal Ridge: Here the permafrost juts up from the bedrock at severe angles while treacherous deep ice crevasses lie concealed underfoot between the icy tors.
  • Echo Valley: [PROCESSING]
  • Frostfall Basin: [PROCESSING]
  • Frostbite Harbor: [PROCESSING]
  • Northpoint: [PROCESSING]
  • Old Shore: [PROCESSING]
  • Pale Canyon: [PROCESSING]
  • The Shattered Warpgate: The northeastern portion of Esamir, recently obliterated due to an overload happening far below a malfunctioning Warpgate. This area is still heavily irradiated with ancient energy, emanating from an ancient, unearthed structure.
  • Stillwater Shallows: [PROCESSING]
Unlocks the Concussion Mine for the TR Infiltrator.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 40 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
Wearable by Heavy Assault. TR use only.

The Scythe is a one-man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the Vanu Sovereignty. Vanu technology allows the Scythe to be a more stable aircraft when hovering and decelerating. The unique silhouette of the Scythe makes it difficult to hit in a face-to-face firefight, but exceedingly vulnerable to attacks from above or below.

Faction: Vanu Sovereignty
Size: Medium
Type: ESF
Movement: Aircraft
Cerberus Ammunition divides the weapon's damage into three separate pellets that spread horizontally when fired from the hip, and vertically when fired while aiming.

A Platoon is a group made of up two to four Squads (consisting of up to 12 players in each Squad, and up to 48 players total in the Platoon). Squads are labeled as "Alpha", "Bravo", "Charlie", and "Delta". Each Squad has their own Squad Leader, and the Alpha Squad Leader often acts as the leader for the platoon.

Platoons allow multiple squads to act as cohesive, coordinated force. Press the "Insert" key to auto join a squad on the same continent, press the "P" key to open the Squad/Platoon Page, and hold Numpad 1 to speak in Platoon Voice Chat via your microphone.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 195 rounds.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of shamrocks. NSO use only.
Next Rank: Regeneration delay caused by damage lowered to 7 seconds.
Adds green cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. NC use only.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of feathers. TR use only.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Corsair survivability. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Detonates on enemy movement releasing a destabilizing field that affects mechanical targets and prevents them from being repaired for up to 6 seconds.

"Fortune Favors Balance"

Machines, mercenaries, or our eventual robot overlords? The NS Operatives are the freelance military arm of Nanite Systems, the same company that manufactures and markets many of your favorite weapons of war. Each frame is controlled by one of their certified operatives, each rigorously trained to remotely pilot the latest in mass-produced military dominance.

Infantry Weapon Signature:
  • Reduced damage falloff

Exclusive Vehicles:
  • Chimera
  • Dervish
  • Javelin

Releases a wall-penetrating pulse wave that destroys or disables enemy deployables, resets infantry shields, and scrambles the HUD.

3 second fuse.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Corsair's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Detonates on enemy movement and will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius.

Underwater Thrusters Mk IV allow the user to glide along the ocean floor at an accelerated rate. <font color="#dc9c36">Tactical slot item. Press Jump when wielded underwater to use. Prevents use of Light Assault Jump Jets when wielded underwater.</font>
Replaces the standard buckshot with dart-like flechettes that triple the maximum and minimum damage falloff range, but reduce the number of pellets fired per shot by 3.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 55 seconds.

The Reaver is a one-man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the New Conglomerate. Its high-capacity engines combined with extended afterburner capacity make this aircraft the fastest empire specific fighter in the skies. With the largest front silhouette of the fighters, the Reaver makes up for it with harder hitting firepower and superior hovering mobility.

Faction: New Conglomerate
Size: Medium
Type: ESF
Movement: Aircraft
Celebrate Saint Patrick's Day with this lucky bundle. Comes with the Wyrdwood Shillelagh melee weapon, helmet, decal, and "Druid" title. All factions receive these items.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 50 seconds.

Combat Medics are a versatile class, as capable at eliminating threats with their Assault Rifle as they are healing and reviving allies with their Medical Applicator tool. Keeping a cool head and evaluating the threats to yourself and your teammates is key to success. Behind every great squad is a Combat Medic who knows that sometimes the best way to save your allies is to take down the enemy first.

Weapons:
  • Assault Rifle
  • Shotgun
  • Submachine Gun
  • Scout Rifle
  • Amphibious Rifle

Abilities:
  • Nano-Regen Device (default) - While active, you and your surrounding allies rapidly regenerate health, effectively letting you to absorb one or two more hits before dying. Higher ranks increase the healing rate.
  • Shield Recharging Field - Deploys a device that emits a field that recharges the shields of nearby allies. Higher ranks increase the regeneration rate and effect radius.

Tool:
  • Medical Applicator - Used to heal or revive allies. Higher ranks enhance both healing and revive speeds.

Tips:
  • Consider upgrading the Medical Applicator tool to rank 5 early to speed up your healing and reviving (save the expensive final rank for later).
  • Don't get so caught up with healing and reviving that you neglect the enemy threat.

Underwater Thrusters Mk I allow the user to glide along the ocean floor at an accelerated rate. <font color="#dc9c36">Tactical slot item. Press Jump when wielded underwater to use. Prevents use of Light Assault Jump Jets when wielded underwater.</font>
Adds green cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. NSO use only.
Reel in some big fish from the waters of Auraxis.
Unlocks the Havoc Mine for NSO Infiltrators.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450.

Nanite Systems' answer to the MAX units available to other empires: the Defector trades dual weapon systems for a mounted grenade printer that uses a heat mechanic instead of traditional ammunition.

Weapons:
  • Defector Grenade Printers

Abilities:
  • Time Bomb (default) - When activated, your weapons no longer generate heat and you take less damage, but will detonate after several seconds inflicting damage on all nearby infantry and vehicles, killing the unit in the process. Higher ranks increase the damage reduction.
  • Seraph Shield - Creates a large bubble shield surrounding the Defector, preventing enemies from harming those within the shield. Damage to the shield is passed on to the Defector itself, and is reduced for the duration. Higher ranks increase duration and reduce cooldown time.
  • Emergency Repair - When activated, the Defector will repair 20% of its max health over the next 12 seconds. Higher ranks reduce the cooldown time.

Tips:
  • The Defector has access to any implants usable by the MAX class.
  • Be mindful of your ability key when you have the Time Bomb ability equipped.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of feathers. VS use only.

Hit the jackpot with this Saint Patrick's Day bundle. Comes with the "Jackpot" Commissioner, lucky banner, shamrock contrails, green afterburner effects, and Danny Boy horns. All factions receive these items.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of shamrocks. VS use only.

Each facility contains up to four consoles which interface with ancient subterranean Vanu technology capable of harnessing the energies of the continent.

Control consoles are captured by standing near them. Only standard infantry may influence a normal control point. MAX units, Defectors, or infantry in a vehicle are not eligible to do so. The infantry unit's faction must also control a facility directly connected to the current one via a lattice link, and that connected facility must not have any capture points controlled by a hostile faction.

Once the majority of a facility's control points are owned by an attacking faction, ownership of that facility will start being contested.

Jump Pads are placed on the exterior of facilities and will propel infantry soldiers at high speeds in a specific direction.

Each "jump" is intended to move the propelled soldier to a specific location. Slight adjustments can be made to one's destination mid-flight by using the movement keys and more significant changes can be made mid-air when using the Light Assault's Jump Jets class ability.
Adds pink cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. NSO use only.
Increases the Corsair's top speed, while reducing turning capabilities slightly.

Releases a pulse of force that knocks back both enemies and the wielder.

Detonates on impact.

Heya slick. This new update brings loads of changes and expansions to your existing arsenal, on top of balance tune-ups, new equipment, and a new Black Market Directive.

  • New and updated Infantry Weapons
  • New and updated Vehicle Weapons
  • New and updated Weapon Attachments
  • Updated Infantry Suit, Ability, and Implants
  • Vehicle adjustments including new Defense slot options
  • New faction-specific mines
  • New class-specific grenades

Genudine's heavily modified Guardian rifle was initially designed for long-range support for Heavy Assault soldiers ambushing from on high or in cover. Deadly from even long distances, the accurate Guardian can drop targets from afar with ammo to spare.
Dispenses ammo to allied vehicles within 14m and squad members may spawn directly into your vehicle. Allows the ANT to deploy and act as an infantry spawn point.

An island continent of austere plateaus, deep canyons, and ancient trees, Hossin is primeval in its appearance. Much of the lowland regions are stony marshland overrun with thick vegetation, fetid mist, and brackish pools of water.

Mythological Etymology

  • Major facilities on Hossin are named after icons of Inca/Mayan mythology: Chac, Acan, Ghanan, Naum, Hurakan, Ixtab, Bitol, Mulac, and Zotz.

Geographical Features

  • Broken Vale: [PROCESSING]
  • Johari Cove: [PROCESSING]
  • Naum Ravine: [PROCESSING]
  • Nettlemire: [PROCESSING]
  • The Offal Pit: [PROCESSING]
  • Voltan Reservoir: [PROCESSING]
  • Whispering Vale: [PROCESSING]

Mechanized Exo-Suit or simply MAX units are infantry in vehicle-class power armor. This armor provides superior resistance to damage and provides support for specialized MAX weaponry. Equipping a MAX suit costs Nanites like a vehicle.

Weapons:
  • Anti-Infantry MAX
  • Anti-Armor MAX
  • Anti-Aircraft MAX

    • Abilities:
    • Emergency Repairs - When activated, repairs a percentage of the MAX's total health over time. Higher ranks reduce the cooldown time.
    • Power Armor - MAX units have increased health pools, but do not have personal shields like other infantry. Damage sustained must be repaired like a vehicle.

    Tips:
    • The Engineer's tools can repair the MAX, while a downed MAX must be revived by a Combat Medic.
    • The exo-suit is bulky, which hinders mobility and prevents the MAX from riding in most vehicles that aren't dedicated transports.
    • Unlike standard infantry, the MAX is unable to influence control points.
Increases magazine size by 3 rounds, but increases hipfire cone of fire by 20%.
Attaches a 1.25x optical zoom to your weapon.

Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station with a shield that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers. Damage done to the shield will delay the shield's regeneration for 8 seconds.
Allows the Light Assault to use Impulse grenades.
Adds green cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. All factions can use this gear.

Ready yourself for romance as love fills the air and battlefields of Auraxis.

Your old friend FL-34 is back at it again with daily Matchmaking Missions, so give him a hand with his schemes to earn valuable rewards or show your dedication to L-O-V-E by completing this year's Seasonal Directive. Love, as they say, is a fragile blossom, but the limited-time camos, weapons, and cosmetics found in the Depot are not.

The Liberator is a three-man gunship with access to bombardier weapons that can devastate ground targets as well as nose and tail guns that soften ground targets or act as deterrents to enemy fighters.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Large
Type: Gunship
Movement: Aircraft
A heavy barrel reduces cone of fire bloom by 20% while aiming down sights, but reduces aim down sights movement speed by 20%.
Unlock various gadgets for the Corsair's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.

Choosing a faction will permanently align your outfit with the VS, NC, or TR. The operatives of your outfit will receive that faction as their "Home Faction." Once chosen, players of that faction and NS Operatives assigned to that Home Faction can be recruited into your outfit.

<font color="#dc9c36">Membership is required for an operative in your outfit to maintain the Home Faction assignment and dropped Memberships will place that operative into a freelance state, but will not kick them from the outfit. Freelance operatives will always be assigned to the lowest populated faction on a continent. Outfit communication and other outfit-related features will be disabled for that operative while fighting for an opposing faction.</font>
%0 will permanently swear alliegiance to the %1 and all outfit members will gain %1 as their "home faction." Are you sure?

The Harasser is an agile three-person buggy designed for transit and skirmish tactics. The driver and gunner are both seated inside the cockpit, while the third passenger stands in the rear of the buggy and can make use of their current loadout from the attached rumble seat.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Medium
Type: Transport
Movement: Wheeled

An untamed frontier of thundering steppes, parched ravines, and biting dust storms, Indar is the most recent continent to be settled by humanity, having been thrust above the ocean waves less than twenty years ago.

The continent is also host to vast untapped mineral reserves hidden away just meters beneath the dry, ancient seabed.

Mythological Etymology

  • Major facilities on Indar are named after icons of Persian/Mesopotamia mythology: Allatum, Dahaka, Hvar, Mao, Peris, Rashnu, Saurva, Tawrich, and Zurvan

Geographical Features

  • Copper Ravine: [PROCESSING]
  • Crimson Bluff: [PROCESSING]
  • The Crown: Indar is dominated at its center by The Crown, a massive granite prominence that stands as a mute sentinel over the surrounding countryside.
  • The Sleeping Sea (Region): The northern expanse of Indar is a hot, arid wasteland. Prior to The Bending, this region was submerged beneath the ocean floor. Today, this windswept desert is littered with fossilized coral reefs and skeletal remains of large marine vertebrates.
  • Feldspar Canyon: [PROCESSING]
  • The Highlands (Region): The southwestern corner of Indar is a temperate savannah of rolling hills and scattered vegetation. This region of Indar was once contiguous with the continent of Amerish. Since the upheaval of The Bending, the Highlands are now separated from Amerish by the Bay of Indar.
  • J908 Impact Site: A massive crater caused by the impact of a large interstellar meteoroid during The Bending. Only recently have scientists discovered that the J908 meteorite is comprised almost entirely of the rare Auraxis alloy polystellarite.
  • Quartz Ridge: [PROCESSING]
  • Rashnu Cavern: [PROCESSING]
  • Red Ridge: [PROCESSING]
  • Regent Rock: [PROCESSING]
  • Rust Mesa: [PROCESSING]
  • The Scar (Region): The southeastern quadrant of Indar is a mountainous region interlaced with deep gorges and winding canyons.
  • Scarred Mesa: [PROCESSING]
  • Snake Ravine: [PROCESSING]
Unlocks the Concussion Mine for the TR Engineer.

The Colossus is a heavy tank armed with a dynamic Mammoth Cannon primary weapon and four secondary weapons for defense. In addition, the Colossus can deploy into an anti-air skylance battery, surrounding itself with a cortium-powered bombardment shield, and highlighting Bastion weakpoints within 1000 meters.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Large
Type: Armor
Movement: Tank
Adds pink cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. All factions can use this gear.

The Lightning is a light one-man tank that can be outfitted with various types of turrets allowing it to fill anti-air or anti-armor roles.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Medium
Type: Light Armor
Movement: Tank
Dispenses ammo to allied vehicles within 16m and squad members may spawn directly into your vehicle. Allows the ANT to deploy and act as an infantry spawn point.
Anticipate the random roll of the dice with these custom tire trails. NSO use only.
Check out the latest weapons of war!

Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station with a shield that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers. Damage done to the shield will delay the shield's regeneration for 10 seconds.

Nanite Systems' high density rod and reel for the discerning angler. Used on the waters of Auraxis to catch really big fish.

Use Aim to cast your line and Fire to set the hook & reel it in.

"Technology Equals Might"

Scientists, enlightened, or cultists? The Vanu Sovereignty seeks the betterment of all by elevating humanity to the next state of existence through the understanding and exploitation of alien technology. Their singular purpose is to uncover the secrets hidden in the Vanu artifacts scattered over the surface of Auraxis, and they will annihilate anyone who stands in their way.

Infantry Weapon Signature:
  • Energy weapons with no bullet drop

Exclusive Vehicles:
  • Magrider
  • Scythe
A forward grip increases control of the weapon, reducing horizontal recoil by 25%, but increases equip time by 0.15 sec.

A Squad is a group of up to twelve players that grants access to a number of coordination-focused benefits and incentives.

Squads are intended to facilitate coordinated play, offering conveniences such as shared waypoints, live updates of squadmates' locations, and increased spawning opportunities near squadmates. Engaging in combat near squadmates, and providing them with support, also rewards increased Experience Points.

Squads can be formed at any time by pressing the Open Squad/Platoon Page key ("P" by default) and clicking Create Squad, entering the /squad create command in the chat, or inviting another player to a squad whilst neither player is in one. Doing so immediately creates the squad and designates the creating player as the Squad Leader.

Every base has a Spawn Room that provides a respawn location for the facility's owners. These rooms are protected by one-way shields and an anti-infantry Pain Field that makes it intensely uncomfortable for enemy soldiers to remain near them.

Each Spawn Room is equipped with one or more Infantry Terminals to allow returning soldiers to rearm or resupply.

Spawn Rooms often have Teleporters to a secondary shielded room that allows the defenders to take an alternate route to the facility's Control Points.
Adds green cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. TR use only.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of shamrocks. TR use only.

The Valkyrie is a six person aircraft used for close air support and transportation. It is crewed by a pilot and a forward gunner with room for four passengers that can use their personal equipment while in flight.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Medium
Type: Transport
Movement: Aircraft
Earn this reward through an assited kill using this weapon.
A smart-choke tightens pellet spread by 40% when firing while aimed, but widens pellet spread by 20% when firing from the hip.
An ornate banner of green and gold said to bring good fortune to those who use it.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.

The Cleansing Grenade releases a wave of nanites that heal allied infantry over time and immediately clears most status effects.

Detonates on impact.

The Sunderer is an armored personnel carrier capable of holding twelve soldiers: a driver, two gunners, and nine passengers. This vehicle has a built-in deploy function that allows it to become a spawn point for your faction. It can be outfitted with several support functions such as a proximity vehicle ammo resupply or proximity vehicle repair.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Large
Type: Transport
Movement: Wheeled
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of shamrocks. All factions can use this gear.
The weapon now fires an accurate, high-velocity slug dealing 450 damage, falling off to 300 at the weapon's minimum damage range.

The Mosquito is a one-man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the Terran Republic. Decades of refinement have made this aircraft the quickest and most agile of all the empire-specific aircrafts and its relatively thin airframe make it more difficult to hit from above or below.

Faction: Terran Republic
Size: Medium
Type: ESF
Movement: Aircraft
Maintain lattice connection to an enemy Flotilla.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 15% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.

Gravity Lifts augment the application of gravity in a cylindrical shape within a set distance beyond their point of origin.

A soldier stepping into this area will be moved toward or away from that point at a uniform speed as long as they remain within the visible beam.
Next Rank: Regeneration delay caused by damage lowered to 6 seconds.
The Palisade heavy machine gun increases in rate of fire over one second while the trigger is held, and is effective against armor, air, and infantry. TR use only.
Increases magazine size by 20 rounds by streamlining the ammunition placement and feeding, and slows your reload speed by 0.325 seconds.
Anticipate the random roll of the dice with these custom tire trails. All factions can use this gear.

Underwater Thrusters Mk V allow the user to glide along the ocean floor at an accelerated rate. <font color="#dc9c36">Tactical slot item. Press Jump when wielded underwater to use. Prevents use of Light Assault Jump Jets when wielded underwater.</font>

When you're ready to fight for the glory of your faction, you can press the redeploy key ("U" key by default). Once the ten-second countdown concludes, you can select a spawn location designated with a green map marker. Explosions that appear on the map screen indicate areas of intense combat.

Alternatively, you can press the Join Combat key ("J" key by default) to automatically drop into a firefight. Join Combat is disabled in safezones like Sanctuary or VR Training, so you'll want to visit your map screen to warp to an active combat environment before use.
Wearable by Engineer. TR use only.
Adds pink cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. TR use only.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 25% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
An opulent banner of stylized diamonds customized with your faction's primary color.
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.

There are two primary methods of triggering an alert for the continent:

1) The continent's population reaches 800 or more players
2) Any faction reaches 100 Empire Strength

Empire Strength is displayed at the top of the world map and is determined by the percentage of territory each faction controls, as well as sub-objectives that can vary from continent to continent.

The Vanguard is a sturdy tank used exclusively by the New Conglomerate. It favors heavy front armor and a large main cannon at the cost of speed. The Vanguard's defenses are further enhanced by its Forward Vanguard Shield, which massively reduces incoming damage from the front and sides while active.

Faction: New Conglomerate
Size: Large
Type: MBT
Movement: Tank
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of shamrocks. NC use only.

This underbarrel Impulse Launcher fires a non-lethal grenade that knocks back the user and enemy infantry on impact. Increases the equip time of the attached weapon by 0.25 seconds.

Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.

Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station with a shield that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers. Damage done to the shield will delay the shield's regeneration for 9 seconds.

Choosing a faction will permanently align your Outfit with the VS, NC, or TR. The operatives of your Outfit will receive that faction as their "Home Faction." Once chosen, players of that faction and NS Operatives assigned to that Home Faction can be recruited into your Outfit.

Membership is required for an operative in your outfit to maintain the Home Faction assignment, and dropped Memberships will place that operative into a Freelance state, but will not kick them from the Outfit. Freelance operatives will always be assigned to the lowest populated faction on a continent. Outfit communication and other Outfit-related features will be disabled for that operative while fighting for an opposing faction.
An angled forward grip reduces the vertical recoil of the first shot in a burst by 60%, but increases the side to side recoil of a weapon by 10%.
Detonates after detecting enemy movement releasing a disorienting blast that temporarily blurs enemy vision while disrupting movement control.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 260 rounds.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.
Wearable by Light Assault. TR use only.
Allows the Medic to use Cleansing grenades.
Detects enemy movement and detonates releasing a pulse wave that destroys or disables enemy deployables, reduces infantry shields, and scrambles heads up displays.

Some major facilities throughout Auraxis use Spawn Control Units (or SCUs) to control a nearby spawn room's access to the rebirthing matrix. This controls the ability of the defenders to respawn in a specific spawn room, the power to the otherwise impenetrable shields that protect the spawn room, and the surrounding pain fields that push back attacks.

Players attacking a facility to which they have an uncontested lattice link can overload that facility's SCU, starting the countdown until it is destroyed. To start an overload, an attacking infantry unit must interact with the SCU for several seconds. And once the overload process has begun, both the SCU's map icon and HUD icon will flash to alert nearby allies and enemies of the impending destruction.

A defending infantry unit may stabilize an overloading SCU at any time prior to its destruction, demanding that attackers remain vigilant until the SCU is destroyed.

Destroyed SCUs can be repaired by defending Engineers by using their Nano-Armor Kit (repair tool). Nano-repair Grenades and their underbarrel counterparts are unable to repair SCUs.

The Bastion Fleet Carrier is a multi-purpose airship available to outfits and comes equipped with fighter launch pads, soldier respawn capabilities, and multiple manned and automated weapon systems. Each carrier requires a significant time and resource investment to build and deploy, and each faction can only be represented by a single carrier on each continent.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Massive
Type: Flagship
Movement: Aircraft

Underwater Thrusters allow the user to glide along the ocean's floor at an accelerated rate. <font color="#dc9c36">Tactical slot item. Press Jump when wielded underwater to use. Cannot be equipped by Light Assault.</font>
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Corsair.

The Infiltrator is a recon unit with a short duration cloaking ability, spotting tools, and the ability to convert enemy terminals and devices to your faction by hacking them.

Weapons:
  • Sniper Rifle
  • Scout Rifle
  • Amphibious Rifle
  • Submachine Gun
  • Heavy Crossbow

    • Abilities:
    • Cloaking - While active, Infiltrators will blend into their surroundings and become nearly invisible. The cloak is more effective while motionless and most effective while crouching. Cloaked targets can be revealed when lit with a Darklight Flashlight (an attachment found on many weapons).

    Tools:
    • Recon Detection Device (default) - Fires a dart which pulses every few seconds to detect the location of nearby fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators. Higher ranks improve the scanning rate, extend the range, and increases the lifespan of the dart.
    • Motion Spotter - While deployed, periodically shares the locations of nearby enemies to all allies and provides real time positional updates to the Infiltrator. Higher ranks increase the location range, improves the update frequency, increases the duration of the spotter, and increases the quantity that can be carried.

    Tips:
    • Always try to keep a motion spotter or recon dart in areas that enemies could approach from, and restock your recon devices from the Engineer's Ammunition Package for increased up-time.
    • You're not completely invisible while cloaked and can be seen by observant players, especially at close range or when moving.

PlanetSide 2 is a revolutionary massive scale first-person shooter where soldiers from each faction fight for dominance in an all-out planetary war. The game challenges the skill and grit of the most seasoned soldier through intense infantry, air, and ground vehicle gameplay.

Your outfit is currently freelancing. While freelancing your outfit cannot recruit additional members. Your members will always be assigned to the lowest population faction on a continent. Outfit communication and other outfit-related features will be disabled when Freelancing for an opposing faction.
Dispenses ammo to allied vehicles within 12m and squad members may spawn directly into your vehicle. Allows the ANT to deploy and act as an infantry spawn point.
When in doubt, bonk it over the head with this giant, squeaky hammer. All factions can use this weapon.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 21% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
Replaces the standard buckshot with dart-like flechettes that triple the maximum and minimum damage falloff range, but reduce the number of pellets fired per shot by 2.
Dispenses ammo to allied vehicles within 18m and squad members may spawn directly into your vehicle. Allows the ANT to deploy and act as an infantry spawn point.

Releases a wave of nanite scramblers that prevents mechanical targets from being repaired.

Detonates on impact.

The Advanced Nanite Transport (ANT) is built for the mining and transport of Cortium, a mineral used to construct and power various player-made buildings and modules. Cortium is also able to fuel a variety of ANT enhancements such as barriers and turbo.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Medium
Type: Transport
Movement: Wheeled
Visit the location specified in any combat zone

Outfits are groups of players who work together to accomplish goals in PlanetSide 2.

Outfits range from casual to hardcore or competitive, and some even specialize in a particular aspect of gameplay. Joining an outfit is a great way to learn, make friends, meet experienced players, and contribute to success on the battlefield.

Open the Outfit window ("O" key by default) to search for an outfit that suits your style of play. Most are eager to take on new players and teach you how to make an impact!

Freelance NSO characters cannot create or join outfits. Please become a member to choose a home faction and enjoy other benefits.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 65 rounds.
Next Rank: Regeneration delay caused by damage lowered to 8 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 325 rounds.
This shortened barrel reduces cone of fire bloom by 40% when firing from the hip, and increases vertical recoil by 20% while aiming down sights.
Manticore Ammunition reduces the movement speed of enemy infantry by 20% for 2 seconds, but reduces the weapon's projectile velocity by 40% at all times.
Adds pink cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. NC use only.
While enabled, holding the quick-melee key will switch to your wielded melee weapon.

DOUBLE EXPERIENCE for ALL from April 1 through April 3!
Wear The Schnoz for even more bonus experience!

Don't miss out on the DEPOT's limited-time bundles, including the return of fan favorite vehicle horns as well as the all-new Jester's Bundle, which contains the NS SQU-34K hammer, Random Roll Tire Trails, banners, and more.

This underbarrel Havoc Launcher fires a non-lethal grenade that prevents mechanical targets from being repaired. Increases the equip time of the attached weapon by 0.25 seconds.

Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.
Adds pink cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 810.

The Dervish is an airborne, heavy fighter. The pilot commands light forward-facing weaponry while a secondary gunner operates a top turret that can ward off enemy air vehicles and apply additional pressure to attack targets.

Faction: NS Operatives
Size: Medium
Type: ESF
Movement: Aircraft

Engineers provide support on the battlefield by repairing mechanical objects, resupplying allies with ammunition, and deploying a variety of battlefield equipment. Their presence in a vehicle is always helpful as their extensive mechanical knowledge allows them to perform field repairs.

Weapons:
  • Carbine
  • Submachine Gun
  • Shotgun
  • Scout Rifle
  • Amphibious Rifle
  • Anti-Materiel Rifle

Abilities:
  • Ammunition Package - Toss an ammo pack on the ground that can resupply ammo to nearby infantry. Higher ranks increase the duration of the ammo pack.
  • Anti-Infantry MANA Turret - Construct a machine gun turret that is highly effective against infantry. Equipped with a projectile shield that protects the operator from forward facing threats. Higher ranks increase the amount of time it takes for the turret to overheat from sustained fire.
  • Anti-Vehicle MANA Turret - An anti-vehicle version of the MANA turret with laser-guided explosive rockets.
  • Spitfire Auto-Turret - Deploys a Spitfire Auto-Turret that automatically engages nearby hostile infantry. Only one Spitfire can be active at a time. Higher ranks decrease the cooldown time between placements.

Tools:
  • Nano-Armor Kit - Used to repair friendly vehicles, MAXes, deployables, and terminals. Can also be used to disarm enemy ordinance. Higher ranks improve repair speed and overheat threshold.

Tips:
  • Consider upgrading the Nano-Armor Kit tool to rank 5 early to greatly improve your repair rate (save the expensive final rank for later).
  • Staying near allied MAX units with your repair tool active creates a symbiotic relationship that increases the survival of both users, allowing the MAX to more readily dispatch threats that might otherwise have the upper hand against you.
Displays a dot reticle for vehicles while in third person. (Default: On)

Alerts are timed events where players attempt complete a map-wide objective to benefit their faction - typically the conquering the continent upon completion.

When an alert is triggered, all players on the relevant continent will be alerted with an alarm sound and a timer appearing in the corner of their screen counting down towards the commencement of the alert. Upon the start of the event, players will be notified of the name and objective of the alert.

Alerts on the player's current continent can be seen at any time on the score screen, which can be viewed using the Show Score Screen key ("Tab" key by default). Continents with active alerts will also feature an alarm icon next to their name on the world map.
Detonates after detecting enemy movement releasing a disorienting blast that temporarily blurs enemy vision while disrupting movement control.

Underwater Thrusters Mk II allow the user to glide along the ocean floor at an accelerated rate. <font color="#dc9c36">Tactical slot item. Press Jump when wielded underwater to use. Prevents use of Light Assault Jump Jets when wielded underwater.</font>
Detonates on enemy movement and will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius.

A beautiful landscape of lush forests and verdant fields, broken up by jagged outcroppings of rock. At the center of the continent rises a tawny pinnacle of eroded shale perpetually wreathed in lenticular clouds.

Mythological Etymology

  • Major facilities on Amerish are named after icons of Native American mythology: Tumas, Onatha, Sungrey, Xelas, Mekala, Ikanan, and Heyoka

  • Eastshore: [PROCESSING]

  • Shadespire Dale: [PROCESSING]

  • Silver Valley: [PROCESSING]

Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 47 seconds.
Unlocks the EMP Mine for the NC Engineer.

Celebrate the luckiest holiday of the year with the new Wyrdwood Bundle, the 2022 Saint Patrick's Day Bundle, and an assortment of returning favorites.

Check out the Depot for all of the limited time weapons, camo, and cosmetics before they're gone!
because there is no line of sight to the deployable.
Increases the Corsair's turning and drifting capabilities while reducing top speed slightly.

Terminals are interactable objects located at bases or warpgates that provide functions ranging from equipment changes and resupply to the spawning of air or ground vehicles. While the quantity and types of terminals available is largely determined by the size and type of the facility, most bases will have at least one terminal.

Most terminals can be hacked by Infiltrators, aligning the terminal with the hacker's faction. These terminals will remain in their hacked state until destroyed, hacked again, or the facility is captured.

Types of terminals:
  • Aircraft - Spend Nanites to spawn Valkyries, Galaxies, or empire-specific fighters. Liberators can also be spawned at large facilities and warpgates.
  • Colossus - Similar to the Ground Vehicle terminal, but for spawning an outfit's Colossus tank.
  • Command - Used to launch an outfit's Bastion Fleet Carrier
  • Energy Bridge - Controls the faction of the adjacent energy bridge. May be hacked by any class.
  • Equipment - Allows infantry or MAX units to change class or equipment, as well as resupply ammunition, consumables, and shielding.
  • Ground Vehicle - Spend Nanites to spawn main battle tanks in addition to the vehicles available from Light Vehicle terminals.
  • Light Vehicle - Spend Nanites to spawn Flashes, Harassers, Sunderers, ANTs, Lightnings, and (NSO-only) Javelins.
  • Mission Board - Opens the Mission interface, allowing players to view and accept missions.
  • Sunderer Tower - Controls the faction of the adjacent Sunderer Tower. Can be hacked by any class.
  • Tempest Siphon - Exclusive to the Containment Site facility. Defenders may activate this to activate the Tempest Siphon. Attackers may activate this to disable the Tempest Siphon.
  • Warpgate - Opens the World Map interface. Allows infantry and MAX units to warp to other continents.

Underwater Thrusters Mk III allow the user to glide along the ocean floor at an accelerated rate. <font color="#dc9c36">Tactical slot item. Press Jump when wielded underwater to use. Prevents use of Light Assault Jump Jets when wielded underwater.</font>

Identified by their bulkier armor, Heavy Assaults are the front-line brawler of your faction's infantry. They possess an energy-fueled overshield for added survivability, come equipped with high-capacity light machineguns for large-scale infantry firefights, and carry a rocket launcher capable of inflicting heavy damage to vehicles.

Weapons:
  • Light Machinegun
  • Shotgun
  • Submachine Gun
  • Scout Rifle
  • Amphibious Rifle
  • Heavy Weapons

Abilities:
  • Improved Nanite Shields - While active, this short-duration shield will absorb more damage and increase your chances of survival against infantry and vehicles. These shields will slow the Heavy's movement while active. Higher ranks increase the uptime for the ability.

Tools:
  • Rocket Launchers - Choose from a variety of launchers to combat armored vehicles or aircraft. Some specialize in a particular vehicle type or offer features such as lock-on targeting.

Tips:
  • While more durable than other classes, you're not invincible. Press the advance, but don't leave your teammates behind.

The Magrider is a hover tank used exclusively by the Vanu Sovereignty. Its hover capabilities allow it to climb terrain better than other tanks as well as move sideways to evade incoming tank shells and infantry-fired rockets.

Faction: Vanu Sovereignty
Size: Large
Type: MBT
Movement: Hover
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Allows squadmates to spawn directly into the vehicle, and prevents you from receiving penalties caused by critical vehicle health.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to leave a trail of feathers. All factions can use this gear.
Patriot camo and flare guns available today only!

Facilities throughout Auraxis use secondary, on-site power sources to maintain features such as interior shields or larger exterior vehicle shields. These generators are positioned within the general proximity of the shields they are powering and display matching iconography (ex. shield with horizontal lines).

Players attacking a facility to which they have an uncontested lattice link can overload any of that facility's generators, starting the countdown until they are destroyed. To start an overload, an attacking infantry unit must interact with the generator for several seconds. And once the overload process has begun, both the generator's map icon and HUD icon will flash to alert nearby allies and enemies of the impending destruction.

A defending infantry unit may stabilize an overloading generator at any time prior to its destruction, demanding that attackers remain vigilant until the generator is destroyed.

Destroyed generators can be repaired by defending Engineers by using their Nano-Armor Kit (repair tool). Nano-repair Grenades and their underbarrel counterparts are unable to repair generators.

The Advanced Nanite Transport (ANT) is built for the mining and transport of Cortium, a mineral used to power a variety of ANT enhancements such as barriers and turbo.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Medium
Type: Transport
Movement: Wheeled
The Pariah is a stable, rapid fire platform with plasma projectiles effective against armor, air, and infantry targets. VS use only.
Next Rank: Regeneration delay caused by damage lowered to 9 seconds.
Adds green cosmetic afterburner effect to this vehicle. VS use only.

Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station with a shield that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers. Damage done to the shield will delay the shield's regeneration for 7 seconds.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.

Part guidebook, part encyclopedia, and part journal, the codex is your repository of knowledge and lore in PlanetSide 2. While additional entries can be acquired through gameplay, each soldier starts with a foundation of information on factions, classes, vehicles, continents, and facility features.

Your outfit is currently Freelancing. While Freelancing your outfit cannot recruit additional members. Your members will always be assigned to the lowest population faction on a continent. Outfit communication and other Outfit-related features will be disabled while Freelancing for an opposing faction.
This heavily modified Thumper variant fires anti-vehicle sabot rounds capable of shredding enemy armor over moderate distances. All factions can use this weapon.

"Loyalty Until Death, Strength in Unity"

Soldiers, unifiers, or dictatorial oppressors? The Terran Republic operates as a rigidly structured and well-funded military fighting force focused on the safety and security of the citizens of the republic. Seen by some as controlling and obsessive, the Terran Republic is intent on the preservation of law and order until they can unify the factions and find their way back to Earth.

Infantry Weapon Signature:
  • High rate of fire weapons

Exclusive Vehicles:
  • Prowler
  • Mosquito
Dispenses ammo to allied vehicles within 20m and squad members may spawn directly into your vehicle. Allows the ANT to deploy and act as an infantry spawn point.
Allows the Heavy Assault to use Havoc grenades.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 630.

Freqently powered by Vehicle Shield Generators, these energized shields have IFF properties that only allow authorized vehicles to pass through.

Vehicle gate shields can be penetrated by vehicles using a Gate Shield Diffuser, which can be purchased with Certs and equipped in the Utility slot for the Flash, Javelin, Harasser, or Sunderer.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 100 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.

The Chimera sports wheels instead of treads, which increases maneuverability through rough terrain. Up to four additional rumble seat passengers may be carried, complementing the driver-operated main cannon, and forward-facing secondary turret.

Faction: NS Operatives
Size: Large
Type: MBT
Movement: Wheeled
The weapon now fires an accurate, high-velocity slug dealing 650 damage, falling off to 500 at the weapon's minimum damage range.
The all-rounder 20mm heavy chain gun is capable of dispatching armor, air, and infantry alike. NSO use only.
Settle your disputes in a gentlemanly manner with this modern take on the classic melee weapon. All factions can use this weapon.

Phalanx Turrets are fixed base defenses found on numerous facilities across Auraxis, providing defenders with firepower able to fight off a variety of threats.

There are three varieties of Phalanx Turrets available:
  • Spear - An anti-vehicle cannon
  • Apsis - An anti-aircraft flak gun
  • Xiphos - An anti-infantry chaingun

All Phalanx Turrets use a heat ammo instead of the typical round-based ammunition.

Normally Phalanx Turrets can only only be used by the faction that owns the base, however Infiltrators can hack them to temporarily change them to the Infiltrator's faction. This will revert if the turret is destroyed or if the facility changes owners.
The Trawler is a slow firing, 30mm heavy machine gun effective against armor, air, and infantry. NC use only.

Teleporter Pads are devices found in numerous facilities across Auraxis.

Primarily available to the faction that holds the facility, Teleporters allow infantry to instantly travel between two predetermined locations.

Each teleporter is paired with another, allowing soldiers to quickly return to their original location if desired.

The Galaxy is an air transport that can be used to hot drop up to 11 soldiers. It has four weapon mounts that can be used for defense or outfitted into a gunship role.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Large
Type: Transport
Movement: Aircraft
Detonates after detecting enemy movement releasing a disorienting blast that temporarily blurs enemy vision while disrupting movement control.

Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station with a shield that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers. Damage done to the shield will delay the shield's regeneration for 6 seconds.

The Light Assault is a close-to-medium range skirmisher. It has a jetpack for enhanced mobility and can quickly move to flank enemy positions.

Weapons:
  • Carbine
  • Submachine Gun
  • Shotgun
  • Amphibious Rifle
  • Heavy Crossbow

Abilities:
  • Jet Pack - Light Assaults have several types of jet packs available for traversing over high obstacles, remaining in the air for extended periods of time, or gaining a quick burst of speed to close the distance to their target. The Light Assault can fire weapons while airborne, but suffer an accuracy penalty for doing so.

Tools:
  • Rocklet Rifle - A six-round rifle that fires explosive mini-rockets capable of damaging armored vehicles. It can fire semi-automatic or unload all rocklets in rapid succession.

Tips:
  • Carbines retain a portion of their accuracy while airborne making them the obvious choice for players first learning the Light Assault class.
  • Flank enemies from angles that normal infantry can't traverse, use cliffs and rooftops to your advantage!
How do I get into battle?

Players are automatically placed into Drop Pods when spawning via a Spawn Beacon, through an outfit's Steel Rain war asset, or rarely when using Join Combat. Drop Pods will immediately plummet toward the surface, with the occupant having limited control over the target landing destination. Upon landing, the occupant is ejected with the pod despawning shortly thereafter.

The Drop Pod can collide with other objects during its descent, destroying one or both in the process. Should the Drop Pod be destroyed, the occupant is killed as well.

Faction: Common Pool
Size: Small
Type: Transport
Movement: Drop Pod
Tickle the funnybone of friends and foes alike with the Jester's Bundle. Includes NS SQU-34K melee weapon, harlequin camo, profile banner, and joker decal. All factions receive these items.
